item.description:
Our monthly meeting at Howieâ€™s home in Glastonbury. Start time is 6:39. We'll be ordering pizza, so be sure to bring a few dollars to pitch in toward the cost. If you would like to bring a salad or appetizer or dessert, feel free, though it's not mandatory. Hope to see you there!

Because this is in a private home, you must RSVP to get the address and directions. That information will be e-mailed to you prior to the meeting.
item.name: Dinner and a meeting
